subject: Football
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Steve Aponavicius, a left-footed soccer convert, was perfect on two field goals and two extra points, and the B.C. defense forced four turnovers to send the Hokies to their second consecutive loss.
snippet: Steve Aponavicius, a left-footed soccer convert, was perfect on two field goals and two extra points, and the B.C. defense forced four turnovers to send the Hokies to their second consecutive loss.
